name: Outbreak (itch) (Intrer)
description:
In this 2D shooter, a scientist developed a way to modify people's DNA. He was able to make them faster and stronger. This had a major side effect: you would become evil from this treatment. Your job is to eliminate this threat to society.

Controls: 

Move: WASD or Arrow keys

Shoot/Inject/Tase: left mouse button

Switch weapons: 1, 2 or 3 depending on the weapon

Created for the Butterscotch Shenanijam.

Achievement: Maverick
